title: Virtual Reality-Based Elementary Science Laboratory Microlearning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science concepts and basic mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: Science experiment education utilizing VR content accessible via smartphones, with mobile-optimized design considering environments without PCs.

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform three or more virtual science experiments in a smartphone-based VR environment
Learners can document scientific reasoning processes with over 80% accuracy based on observations from VR lab experiments
Learners can produce a 3-minute video report explaining phenomena discovered in VR experiments through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
